# Hi, I'm xbl4z3r! üëã 
<br>
I'm a self-taught 17 y/o game developer from Romania. I love cats and coding, and I'm looking forward to expanding my knowledge about computers and programming. Among my roster of projects, you'll find a Discord Bot dedicated to gamers, a tailored Minecraft Client and Launcher, and an upcoming game that I'm buzzing to unveil. I've also participated in the First Tech Challenge as Lead Programmer and Coach in the Centerstage 2023-2024 Season for Team #19121 Tea-Borgs. My latest project is called SpoTuya, a simple open-source CLI tool that allows you to automatically change your Tuya LED lights color based on the cover art of the currently listening track on Spotify. As for programming languages I love using either C# or Java and I simply love JetBrains IDEs. I'm looking forward to collaborating on all sorts of projects so if you have an idea hit me up!
<br><br>
